sentence.Network_en: Juliet Hulme: Daddy says the Bibles a alluviation of bunkum!
sentence.Network_cn: 朱丽叶·休默: 爸爸说《圣经》里是一大堆废话!

sentence.Network_en: Don't believe what he's saying it's pure bunkum.
sentence.Network_cn: 别相信他的话--纯粹是胡说八道.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... bunco 欺诈 buncombe 废话 bund 同盟.
stunning 极漂亮的bunkum 空话cayenne pepper 红椒

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (originally buncombe): named after Buncombe County in North Carolina, mentioned in an inconsequential speech made by its congressman solely to please his constituents (c. 1820)

entry.def: If you say that something that has been said or written is bunkum, you mean that you think it is completely untrue or very stupid.

auth_sentence.content: What a load of old bunkum that turns out to be.
auth_sentence.res_content: What a load of old bunkum that turns out to be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What a load of old bunkum that turns out to be.

auth_sentence.content: Either provide a peer-reviewed paper to back up your claims or take your unscientific bunkum elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: Either provide a peer-reviewed paper to back up your claims or take your unscientific bunkum elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Either provide a peer-reviewed paper to back up your claims or take your unscientific bunkum elsewhere.

auth_sentence.content: These 'space tourist' and 'free fall from space' adventures and contests are pure bunkum.
auth_sentence.res_content: These 'space tourist' and 'free fall from space' adventures and contests are pure bunkum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These 'space tourist' and 'free fall from space' adventures and contests are pure bunkum.
